```{r}
library(shiny)
library(visNetwork)
```
# Navigate the network
##  {.sidebar data-width="200"}
##### Pick a protein to display its interactions
```{r, cache = FALSE}
selectInput(inputId='centerGene',choices=all_nodes$GeneName,label=NULL,selected = "STK11", multiple = F)
``` 
##### Node colors indicate group membership
```{r}
imageOutput('legend',height="auto")
output$legend <- renderImage({
  list(src='kinase_families_legend2.png',width="100%")
},deleteFile=FALSE)
```
##### Highlight a group
```{r,cache=FALSE}
selectizeInput("highlightGroup",label=NULL,choices=NULL,selected=NULL)
observe({
  choices <- c("None selected",colors %>% filter(Group %in% g1()$nodes$group) %>% pull(Group))
  updateSelectizeInput(inputId = 'highlightGroup',choices=choices)
  })
```
##### Change font-size
``` {r,cache=FALSE}
sliderInput("fontSize",label=NULL,min = 10, max = 50, value = 30)
```
##### Export
```{r, cache=FALSE}
  export_choices <- c("Nodes as CSV","Edges as CSV")
  selectizeInput('download_choice',label=NULL,choices=export_choices)
  filename <- reactive({switch(input$download_choice,"Nodes as CSV"='nodes.csv', "Edges as CSV"='edges.csv')})
  (downloadButton('download1',"Download"))
  
  output$download1 <- downloadHandler(
    filename=function() {filename()},
    content = function(file) {
      if(filename()=='nodes.csv') {write.csv(g1()$nodes,file,row.names=F)}
      if(filename()=='edges.csv') {
        from_names <- sapply(g1()$edges %>% pull(from), get_gene_name)
        to_names <- sapply(g1()$edges %>% pull(to), get_gene_name)
        data <- g1()$edges %>% mutate(from_label = from_names,to_label=to_names)
        write.csv(data,file,row.names=F)
      }
    }
  )
  
```

## Main Panel
### Kinase-substrate interactions of `r renderText(input$centerGene)`

```{r, cache=FALSE}
g1 <- reactive(get_one_degree(input$centerGene))
visNetworkOutput('network1')
output$network1 <- renderVisNetwork({
  visNetwork(nodes=g1()$nodes,edges=g1()$edges,physics=F) %>%
  visIgraphLayout() %>% 
  visNodes(font=list(size=30)) %>% 
  visEdges(arrows="to") %>%
  visOptions(highlightNearest = list(enabled=TRUE,labelOnly=F))  %>%
  visEvents(select="function(nodes){Shiny.onInputChange('selectNode',nodes.nodes);}") %>%
  visEvents(doubleClick="function(nodes){Shiny.onInputChange('nextCenterNode',nodes.nodes)}") 
   })

observe({visNetworkProxy("network1") %>% visNodes(font=list(size=input$fontSize))})
infoGene <- reactive({
  if(is.null(input$selectNode)) {input$centerGene} else {get_gene_name(input$selectNode)}
  })
observeEvent(input$nextCenterNode,{updateSelectInput(inputId='centerGene',selected=get_gene_name(input$nextCenterNode))})
observeEvent(input$highlightGroup,{
  if(input$highlightGroup != "None selected") {
    ids <- g1()$nodes %>% filter(group==input$highlightGroup) %>% filter(GeneName!=input$centerGene) %>% pull(id)
    visNetworkProxy("network1") %>% visSelectNodes(id=ids,highlightEdges=F,clickEvent=T) 
  } else {visNetworkProxy("network1") %>% visSelectNodes(id=NULL,highlightEdges=F,clickEvent=T)}
  })
observe({visNetworkProxy('network1') %>% visGetSelectedNodes()})
observe({print(input$network_selectedNodes)})
```
